products.title: Bachelorette Bundle
products.body_html:
What's in the bundle?

6 x 50ml PinkKitty

PinkKitty Liqueur®

PASSION, INTENSITY, FIRE

PinkKitty® is a captivating blend of Ultra-Premium Vodka and Pomegranate mingling with Peach and an exotic blend of herbs. PinkKitty’s sophisticated design is not only intended to deliver amazing taste but adds intimacy to the drinking experience.

The scent of cinnamon in our liqueur enhances the aromas of pomegranate and peach. On the palate, hints of white pepper co-mingle with herbs and fruit. It’s a purr-fect drink for getting in the mood. PinkKitty is also highly mixable, lending itself to a variety of tempting cocktail creations. At 35 Percent Alcohol by Volume, PinkKitty is perfect by itself or ready to be mixed with your favorite mixer!

PinkKitty® is also the first liqueur to use a blend of herbs known around the world for their tantalizing experience. Exotic Herbs like Maca, Avena Sativa, and Damiana bring deliciousness and excitement that can’t be found in any other spirit. Most of all, PinkKitty® is about bringing couples together to have an amazing time.

Please Indulge Responsibly!
PinkKitty Liqueur®, 35% Alc./Vol (70 Proof)

Complimentary on orders over $150.

products.title: Bachelor Bundle
products.body_html:
What's in the bundle?

6 x 50ml EasyRhino

EasyRhino Liqueur®

VIGOR, VITALITY, SOPHISTICATION

EasyRhino® is a seductive blend of Ultra-Premium Vodka and Vanilla mingling with Cinnamon, Blood Orange, and an exotic blend of herbs. EasyRhino’s exotic design is not only intended to deliver amazing taste but adds Vigor to the drinking experience. 

Our liqueur contains subtle notes of vanilla and chamomile that allow you to look into the eyes of the Rhino without blinking. But the beast goes into action on the palate with peppered honey and hot cinnamon. EasyRhino® is also highly mixable, lending itself to a variety of tempting cocktail creations. At 35 Percent Alcohol by Volume, EasyRhino® is perfect by itself or ready to be mixed with your favorite mixer to get the rhino to Charge!

EasyRhino® is also the first liqueur to use a blend of herbs known around the world for their tantalizing experience. Exotic Herbs like Muira Puama, Ashwagandha, and Epimedium bring deliciousness and arousal that can’t be found in any other spirit. Most of all EasyRhino® is about bringing couples together to have an amazing time. When EasyRhino® is involved the possibilities of seduction are endless.

Please Indulge Responsibly!
EasyRhino Liqueur®, 35% Alc./Vol (70 Proof)

Complimentary on orders over $150.

products.title: B&B Bundle
products.body_html:
Complimentary shipping on orders over $150.

What's in the bundle?

3 x 50ml EasyRhino

3 x 50ml PinkKitty

products.title: Night of Passion Package
products.body_html:
In Life's Special Moments, Reach for Passion! 

Night of Passion is the perfect romantic gesture, whether it’s an anniversary, birthday, valentine’s day, or just because it's Tuesday… give the gift of couples indulgence with the Night of Passion Package! The Night of Passion Package is a great way to bring couples closer together. So get ready to let the sparks fly and elevate your sexy time to out-of-this-world-Passion with the Night of Passion Package!

EasyRhino® and PinkKitty® are about bringing couples together to have an amazing time. Our Night of Passion Package includes two 750ml bottles of each of our liqueurs that will make you fall in love with spirits that do more than taste good.

What's in the bundle?

1 x 750ml EasyRhino

1 x 750ml PinkKitty

Please Misbehave Responsibly!
PinkKitty/EasyRhino Liqueur®, 35% Alc./Vol (70 Proof)

Complimentary on orders over $150.
